submission.title: Save As to Web3: A UX Gateway to Decentralized Storage
submission.overview: This proposal upgrades the familiar 'save as...' functionality into a Web3-native interaction—allowing users to save files directly to decentralized cloud storage such as IPFS. By embedding decentralized storage options into user interfaces, this approach enables user agency and sovereignty without requiring technical knowledge. This submission was generated with protocol META-DP-EVAL-v1.3.
submission.raw_content: That's a powerful seed idea—bridging the 'save as…' functionality we all know into a Web3-native future. It takes a common UX pattern and upgrades it with decentralized infrastructure...

directly_addressed_dps.summary: Empowers users to choose decentralized storage locations like IPFS as a form of digital self-determination.
Promotes sovereign, user-controlled data storage through integration with decentralized protocols.
Proposes a standard UI layer for decentralized storage, simplifying access and broadening usability.
Suggests that shared decentralized storage could serve as infrastructure for collaborative meta-community workspaces.
Emphasizes the value of content-addressable storage (e.g., IPFS) in ensuring provenance and verifiability.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: User-Directed Decentralized Storage
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Explicitly support user-directed storage destinations (e.g., IPFS) within the Meta-layer stack.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Empowers individuals with tangible choices over data control and fosters engagement with decentralized tools.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Default to Sovereign Storage
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Recommend decentralized storage as the default for any personally generated data.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Minimizes exposure to centralized data mining and enforces sovereignty by default.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: UI Standards for Save-to-Decentralized-Storage
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Create a common UX pattern, such as a browser-native 'Save to IPFS' option.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Familiar interactions help users adopt advanced infrastructure with minimal friction.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Shared Decentralized Storage for Meta-Communities
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Enable shared use of decentralized storage for collaborative editing and distributed knowledge bases.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Supports cross-group cooperation while preserving data control and modularity.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Content-Addressable Provenance
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Emphasize IPFS and similar protocols for their built-in tamper resistance and data verification.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Guarantees the authenticity and traceability of shared content across platforms.
